name: Oneshot BR
description:
Made for Weekkly Game Jam 53 - Theme: One Hit

The game is set on a forest island affected by climate change, global warming and sea level is rising fast, by the way the seawater is toxic. The ocean is about to flood the island in roughly 2 to 3 minutes.

Instructions
  • Collect bullets
  • Eliminate all the others
  • Stay of the toxic sea water
  • One hit is enough to kill you
Controls
  • WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Right Click - Aim
  • Left Click - Shoot
Credits

SFX: ZapSplat

Download

Choose the 64-bit version if posssible, it's less lag.
